svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
August 17, 2024" date: "2024-08-17"
Eth News and Links
All core devs
* All Core Devs - Execution (ACDE) #194 : Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade :
Pectra-devnet-3 : launch in 2 weeks with EIP7702 (set EOA account code) EOF : targeting
Pectra-devnet-4 in ~4 weeks EIP2537 BLS precompile : reprice gas costs based on
benchmarks PeerDAS : plan to rebase code from Dencun to Pectra but avoid testing other
Pectra EIPs on PeerDAS devnets EIP7732 ePBS : no execution layer changes required other
than builder API, provides delayed execution validation, spec is stable &
implementations have started Post-merge cleanup proposals: Remove totalDifficulty from
Execution API EIP7642 eth/69: drop pre-merge fields to reduce bandwidth
* Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade : Pectra-devnet-3 : launch in 2 weeks with EIP7702
(set EOA account code) EOF : targeting Pectra-devnet-4 in ~4 weeks EIP2537 BLS
precompile : reprice gas costs based on benchmarks PeerDAS : plan to rebase code from
Dencun to Pectra but avoid testing other Pectra EIPs on PeerDAS devnets
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade :
* Pectra-devnet-3 : launch in 2 weeks with EIP7702 (set EOA account code)
Pectra-devnet-3 : launch in 2 weeks with EIP7702 (set EOA account code)
* EOF : targeting Pectra-devnet-4 in ~4 weeks
EOF : targeting Pectra-devnet-4 in ~4 weeks
* EIP2537 BLS precompile : reprice gas costs based on benchmarks
EIP2537 BLS precompile : reprice gas costs based on benchmarks
* PeerDAS : plan to rebase code from Dencun to Pectra but avoid testing other Pectra
EIPs on PeerDAS devnets
PeerDAS : plan to rebase code from Dencun to Pectra but avoid testing other Pectra EIPs
on PeerDAS devnets
* EIP7732 ePBS : no execution layer changes required other than builder API, provides
delayed execution validation, spec is stable & implementations have started
EIP7732 ePBS : no execution layer changes required other than builder API, provides
* Post-merge cleanup proposals: Remove totalDifficulty from Execution API EIP7642
eth/69: drop pre-merge fields to reduce bandwidth
Post-merge cleanup proposals:
* Remove totalDifficulty from Execution API
Remove totalDifficulty from Execution API
* EIP7642 eth/69: drop pre-merge fields to reduce bandwidth
EIP7642 eth/69: drop pre-merge fields to reduce bandwidth
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade, likely targeting Q1 2025
* PeerDAS: PeerDAS breakout #7 : discussed moving to slot auctions to address free data
availability problem in block auctions
* PeerDAS breakout #7 : discussed moving to slot auctions to address free data
Osaka + F starname upgrade
* F-starname last call: suggestion to name consensus layer upgrade Fulu (current
favorite) and combined upgrade Fosaka (Osaka + Fulu)
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.7% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.7% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
Consensus layer: Prysm 36% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
* Consensus layer: Prysm 36%
Consensus layer: Prysm 36%
* Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
* Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America &
Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
* Toni WahrstÃ¤tter: evolution of timing games , Kiln causes biggest problems
Toni WahrstÃ¤tter: evolution of timing games , Kiln causes biggest problems
* Lighthouse tree-states explainer, reduce RAM while keeping more beacon states in
memory
Lighthouse tree-states explainer, reduce RAM while keeping more beacon states in memory
* Dora (explorer): add views of execution & consensus layer clients peer mesh
Dora (explorer): add views of execution & consensus layer clients peer mesh
Research
* Censorship insurance markets for BRAID : proposal to improve user experience issue of
liquidity requirements
Client Releases
* Execution layer: EthereumJS v0.10.2 : RPC improvements Erigon v2.60.6 : improvements
to stateDiff encoding, callTracer & diagnostics Geth v1.14.8 : bug fixes Nethermind
v1.28.0 : adds eth_simulate, enhances OP Stack support & tune Pruning.CacheMb Reth
v1.0.5 : OP Granite upgrade support
* EthereumJS v0.10.2 : RPC improvements
EthereumJS v0.10.2 : RPC improvements
* Erigon v2.60.6 : improvements to stateDiff encoding, callTracer & diagnostics
Erigon v2.60.6 : improvements to stateDiff encoding, callTracer & diagnostics
* Geth v1.14.8 : bug fixes
Geth v1.14.8 : bug fixes
* Nethermind v1.28.0 : adds eth_simulate, enhances OP Stack support & tune
Pruning.CacheMb
Nethermind v1.28.0 : adds eth_simulate, enhances OP Stack support & tune
* Reth v1.0.5 : OP Granite upgrade support
Reth v1.0.5 : OP Granite upgrade support
Layer 2
* Optimism activated permissioned fallback until vulnerabilities from fault proof
audits are fixed by Granite upgrade
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7756 : EOF/EVM trace specification (adds
EOF support to EIP3155 tracing)
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
* EIP7756 : EOF/EVM trace specification (adds EOF support to EIP3155 tracing)
* RIPs (Rollup improvement proposals): RIP7755 : Cross-L2-calls
RIPs (Rollup improvement proposals):
* RIP7755 : Cross-L2-calls
Stuff for developers
* Brock: intervals of memory/heap allocated values in Solidity
Brock: intervals of memory/heap allocated values in Solidity
* Bulloak toolchain (GitHub Action): check Solidity tests conform to Branching Tree
Technique spec
Bulloak toolchain (GitHub Action): check Solidity tests conform to Branching Tree
* Halmos v0.1.14 (symbolic testing): adds toml config, Docker image & forge-std assert
cheatcode support
Halmos v0.1.14 (symbolic testing): adds toml config, Docker image & forge-std assert
* MACI v2 : adds concurrent polls and custom gatekeepers: Hats Protocol, Gitcoin
Passport, Zupass & Semaphore Contribute to MACI v2 trusted setup ceremony
MACI v2 : adds concurrent polls and custom gatekeepers: Hats Protocol, Gitcoin
Passport, Zupass & Semaphore
* Contribute to MACI v2 trusted setup ceremony
Ecosystem
* Eth Magicians call for contributions : new ideas, logo & moderators wanted
Eth Magicians call for contributions : new ideas, logo & moderators wanted
* EF data collection grant recipients share $560k
EF data collection grant recipients share $560k
Job Listings
* Sablier are hiring a Business Development Lead and Frontend Engineer
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
* Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 0.6 to 23.5 gwei, 2.5 gwei average; zero net
issuance at 23.9 gwei 16k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
* Gas: 0.6 to 23.5 gwei, 2.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.9 gwei
Gas: 0.6 to 23.5 gwei, 2.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.9 gwei
* 16k ETH net issuance this week
16k ETH net issuance this week
* ETHUSD : $2,534 - $2,752, currently $2,593, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $2,534 - $2,752, currently $2,593, all time high $4,878
* ETHBTC : currently 0.044 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.044 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Notable at app layer
* Maker voted to offboard WBTC after BitGo announced plans for BiT Global (Justin Sun)
to hold 2 of 3 multisig keys, due to the backlash BitGo Singapore will now hold 3rd key
Coinbase hinted at a future cbBTC
Maker voted to offboard WBTC after BitGo announced plans for BiT Global (Justin Sun) to
hold 2 of 3 multisig keys, due to the backlash BitGo Singapore will now hold 3rd key
* Coinbase hinted at a future cbBTC
* Accept USDC : campaign for small retailers to accept USDC payments
Accept USDC : campaign for small retailers to accept USDC payments
Regulation/business/tokens
* Thai SEC digital asset regulatory sandbox open for applications
Thai SEC digital asset regulatory sandbox open for applications
* CoinDesk: Eigen Labs sent employee addresses to EigenLayer projects for token
airdrops
CoinDesk: Eigen Labs sent employee addresses to EigenLayer projects for token airdrops
General
* Alex Pertsev fundraiser for appeal to 5 year sentence
Alex Pertsev fundraiser for appeal to 5 year sentence
* ZachXBT: DPRK IT workers uncovered at 25+ projects
ZachXBT: DPRK IT workers uncovered at 25+ projects
* NIST post quantum encryption algorithms : ML-KEM, ML-DSA & SLH-DSA
NIST post quantum encryption algorithms : ML-KEM, ML-DSA & SLH-DSA
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-august-17-2024
